```{r starttime}
# save start time for script
start_ptm <- proc.time()
start_ptm
```

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=TRUE, warning=TRUE, message=TRUE, cache=TRUE, dev=c('png','pdf'), fig.width=8, fig.height=8)

```

```{r make_outdir}
outdir <- "./script_name_out/"

if(!outdir %in% list.dirs()) dir.create(outdir, recursive=TRUE)
```

# Packages loaded

```{r loadlibs, echo=TRUE, warning=TRUE, message=TRUE, cache=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
```

sessionInfo()

# Time

```{r endtime}
# output time taken to run script
end_ptm <- proc.time()
end_ptm
end_ptm - start_ptm

```
